text: @tavleen_singh Who cares if it shames #India? Q is, is it right or wrong. Lets get our blinkers off on the @narendramodi administration response to #Covid19 which is largely reactive with no strategy, no planning & no Compassion. It's demonetization all over again, Grand Gesture Zero Execution
